title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.8 - Prohibition of reintroduction of collected contaminants to the air
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 201-1.8 - Prohibition of reintroduction of collected contaminants to the air

State Regulations

No person shall unnecessarily remove, handle, or cause to
be handled, collected air contaminants from an air cleaning device for
recycling, salvage or disposal in a manner that would reintroduce them to the
outdoor atmosphere. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
201-1.8

Amended

New

York State Register February 10, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 06, eff. 2/24/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
